channel.title: RaspberryPi on Jacob Bokor

item.title: Making LEDs React to Music: Configuring LEDFx and Spotifyd on the Raspberry Pi
item.description: This was originally a rough guide I made for myself to retrace my steps in case I needed to re-build my LEDFx setup at some point. I ended up polishing it up and publishing it as a Gist at the request of some people in the LEDFx discord, and since people seemed to find it so helpful I'm re-publishing it here. If it looks a lot like the LEDFx documentation's installation instructions, that's because I've also contributed it upstream.
